EmailTemplate.name: Decoding CFR.Send Email 2.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Explore the True Power of Self-Checkouts in Convenience
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
87% of shoppers say they prefer to shop in stores with robust self-checkout options. But some technologies only take cards—not cash—which just doesn’t make sense for convenience stores.However, there are options to deliver self-checkouts that serve everyone, no matter how they choose to pay, while delivering some unexpected benefits for your behind-the-scenes operations, too.Explore the unexpected benefits of self-checkouts in our latest webinar and learn how to make convenience…more convenient—for everyone. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Webinar Title: Making “Seamless” a Reality for Your C-store Date: October 15, 2020 Time: 2pm Eastern
Participants:
-
Greg Buzek, IHL Group - President
-
Steven O’Toole, NCR - VP of Convenience and Fuel Retail Sales
-
Alan Meyer, Meyer Oil Company - Chief Executive Officer ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
